p.e:
Keep the gearmover
at the gold mine for a
while until you have 2
coins to load up.
Bring those back and
buy a second miner.

the farm 4 coins, and
buy yourself a builder
and a factory.
(don't forget to move it
all with the gearmover)

After placing the bulky
factory next to the gold,
you should start by
either buying more
miners, or if the enemy
is already getting close,
some defensive units.

Getting an assembler
and 5 miners should be
your short-term goal.
Also maybe get a waller
to build some walls and
turrets, and maybe a
